argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The name of a file in the application folder.

argument.name: Inputfilename
argument.description: The filename with drive and folder information.

page.description: Takes a filename, and qualifies it by adding missing drive and path designation (if necessary), relative to the current .ADB file. e.g. 'data.txt' becomes 'c:\myapp\data.txt'
page.discussion: The A5_Qualify_Filename() function qualifies a filename it by adding missing drive and path designation (if necessary), relative to the current .ADB file.
